creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Large Hanging of golden tan satin brocade composed of two widths seamed up the middle. All-over design of peonies, lotus, and trailing leaves in shades of blue. green, magenta, pink, mulberry, violet, grey, pink, brown, and yellow with gold. Lining of yellow raw silk. Inscription. Cf. 42.8.137,.138 for same general type of pattern.
title: Large Hanging
